PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The results showed that both the two polymers exhibit not only high fieldeffect mobilities but also high photovoltaic properties .

Let's think step by step.

1. high field-effect mobilities: This is a compound property made up of "high" and "field-effect mobilities". "Field-effect mobility" is the property name.
2. high photovoltaic properties: This is a compound property made up of "high" and "photovoltaic properties". "Photovoltaic properties" is the property name.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. high field-effect mobility
2. high photovoltaic properties

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The results showed that both the two polymers exhibit not only high fieldeffect mobilities but also high photovoltaic properties .

Let's think step by step.

1. The two polymers: These are the entities being discussed in the paragraph. They are the specific materials whose properties are being referred to.
2. High field-effect mobilities: This is a property or characteristic of the polymers. It refers to their ability to conduct electricity when an electric field is applied.
3. High photovoltaic properties: This is another property or characteristic of the polymers. It refers to their ability to convert light energy into electrical energy.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. High field-effect mobilities (property of the polymers)
2. High photovoltaic properties (property of the polymers)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| High photovoltaic properties (property of the polymers) |
